colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI SH'AKYA THUB PAS SMAN PA'I RGYAL PO'I RGYA GAR YUL DU MANG PO DGE SLONG SOGS BRTZE CHEN BYUNG, ,DE DAG GI DON DU ZHES GSUNGS LA MDZAD PA'O, ,CES GSOL NAS SMAN PA'I RGYAL PO'I 'GRO KUN DON DU MDZAD PA'O, ,DE LTA BU DAD PA DANG DAM PA'I SNGAGS YON TAN DANG LDAN, ,DGE SLONG RAB 'BYAMS PA SHES RAB 'OD ZER ZHES BYA BA RANG GI SLOB MA RNAMS DON DU 'KHYER BA 'DI LTA BU YIN NO, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
